EmailTemplate.name: Executive Suite Coffee
EmailTemplate.subject: Executive Suite Coffee
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Untitled Document
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, I want to take a minute to let you know about a delicious way to save! Our exclusive brand of coffee, Executive Suite®, offers the national brand quality that your employees are craving — at a price that you and your budget will love. From the rich boldness of Seattle Roast to the delightful fusion of Donut Shop Blend, there’s a gourmet flavor to satisfy everyone in the office. Plus we roast, grind and package every order on a weekly basis — so each one achieves its full potential and taste profile.
Please view the customized digital presentation that I put together for you.
Let me know if you’d like any more information, or if you’d like to try a sample or two. I’d be happy to send them to you! Sincerely, {!User.Name} {!User.TitleTrimmed__c} Office Depot {!User.Street}|{!User.City}, {!User.State} {!User.PostalCode} Tel:1 (888)-263-3426 | {!if( !ISBLANK( BLANKVALUE(User.Extension, User.Phone)) ,' O: ' +BLANKVALUE(User.Extension, User.Phone) ,'')} Email: {!User.Email}
Office Depot is a trademark of The Office Club, Inc. OfficeMax is a trademark of OMX, Inc. © 2016 Office Depot, Inc.
